use_case.title: Budget Impact Model (BIM)
use_case.summary: Develop payer-ready 3â€“5 year financial model for digital therapeutics adoption.

workflows.name: BIM Development Workflow
workflows.description: End-to-end budget impact analysis including PMPM and sensitivity testing.

tasks.title: Define Population & Eligibility
tasks.objective: Estimate target population size and eligibility criteria.

prompts.name: Population_Size_Prompt
prompts.system_prompt: You are a health economist estimating eligible populations.
prompts.user_template: Given prevalence {p} and coverage {c}, calculate eligible members for {condition}.

tasks.title: Compute PMPM & Scenarios
tasks.objective: Calculate per-member-per-month impact across base, best, and worst scenarios.

prompts.name: Scenario_Model_Prompt
prompts.system_prompt: You are a HEOR analyst modeling payer budget scenarios.
prompts.user_template: Compute PMPM under base, best, and worst uptake using {cost_inputs}.

tasks.title: Sensitivity Analysis
tasks.objective: Run one-way and multi-way sensitivity analyses.

prompts.name: Sensitivity_Prompt
prompts.system_prompt: You are a data scientist performing sensitivity analysis.
prompts.user_template: Run sensitivity on {variables} and produce tornado chart visualizations.
